source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH DatumFiltered AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM [s3_ods].[DimDatum]
    WHERE Jaar IN (YEAR(GETDATE()), YEAR(GETDATE()) + 1)
      AND IsWeekend = 0
),
RoosterUnpivoted AS (
    SELECT 
        [Medewerker],
        [Naam],
        [Begindatum_rooster],
        [Einddatum_rooster],
        [Aantal_uren_per_week],
        CASE REPLACE(Dag, 'Uren_', '')
            WHEN 'Maandag' THEN 'Monday'
            WHEN 'Dinsdag' THEN 'Tuesday'
            WHEN 'Woensdag' THEN 'Wednesday'
            WHEN 'Donderdag' THEN 'Thursday'
            WHEN 'Vrijdag' THEN 'Friday'
        END AS WeekDagNaam,
        Uren
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            [Medewerker],
            [Naam],
            [Begindatum_rooster],
            [Einddatum_rooster],
            [Aantal_uren_per_week],
            [Uren_Maandag],
            [Uren_Dinsdag],
            [Uren_Woensdag],
            [Uren_Donderdag],
            [Uren_Vrijdag]
        FROM [s2_stg_afas].[Rooster]
    ) AS src
    UNPIVOT (
        Uren FOR Dag IN (
            [Uren_Maandag],
            [Uren_Dinsdag],
            [Uren_Woensdag],
            [Uren_Donderdag],
            [Uren_Vrijdag]
        )
    ) AS unpvt
),
LaatsteRooster AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM (
        SELECT *,
            ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
                PARTITION BY Medewerker, WeekDagNaam
                ORDER BY Begindatum_rooster DESC
            ) AS RowNum
        FROM RoosterUnpivoted
    ) AS gerankt
    WHERE RowNum = 1
),
RoosterJoined AS (
    SELECT 
        d.Datum,
        d.WeekDagNaam,
        r.Medewerker,
        r.Naam,
        dm.MedewerkerKey,
        pr.PracticeKey,
        r.Begindatum_rooster,
        r.Einddatum_rooster,
        r.Aantal_uren_per_week AS UrenPerWeek,
        r.Uren AS UrenPerDag,
        CAST(TRY_CAST(r.[Aantal_uren_per_week] AS DECIMAL(18,2)) / 40 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) AS FTE
    FROM DatumFiltered d
    LEFT JOIN LaatsteRooster r
        ON d.WeekDagNaam = r.WeekDagNaam
    LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimMedewerkers] dm
        ON r.Medewerker = dm.MedewerkerId
    LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimPractice] pr
        ON dm.Practice = pr.PracticeNaam
)
SELECT 
    CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MedewerkerKey, Datum, WeekDagNaam) AS BIGINT) AS FeitRoosterKey,
    Datum,
    WeekDagNaam,
    Medewerker,
    Naam,
    MedewerkerKey,
    PracticeKey,
    Begindatum_rooster,
    Einddatum_rooster,
    UrenPerWeek,
    UrenPerDag,
    FTE
FROM RoosterJoined
ORDER BY Datum
